Blog.post: hey!! i love ur post! ur so sweet ^_^. I called u around 4:10, which wuz as soon as i walked in the door lol, and u werent home, so call me when ya can, k? 143 143 143 Ray P.S. I think getting out from under the rule of the asshole 4 the weekend did me some good ^_^ im actually happy! ... lol

ok... according 2 my mom, we might stay overnight at my aunts house. Ill call when i can! ill c if my mom will let me use the cell if we do end up staying overnight, k? i miss u so much!! 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 Love always Rachel
hey! sup? ive been so busy talkin 2 u on the fone that ive barely had time 2 write in here lol ^_^ call me asap!!! Luv always 143 143 143 143 143 143 Ray

I love you sssooo much, Good luck with the wedding. ill call u on sunday as soon as i get home... 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 love always iray P.s. tell me about the wedding when i get back, k?

This sucks, ya kno that? Tonight, im babysitting till probably late, then 4 the weekend im outta town. :\ Good luck with the wedding, and i'll call u as soon as i get home on sunday, ok? I wish i could talk 2 u 2day... anyway, if u send a new message, i use the emacs at school durring 7th period, so ill check it then, and if not, i guess ill have 2 talk 2 u on sunday or whenever... I miss you so much still. If by some chance im home earlier then i think ill b, ill call u, k? Good luck with the wedding, Ill be thinking of you as always. 143 XOXOXOXOXOXOXO Love always ur iray

Thanks 4 understanding, 143 143 143!! I called you're house and ur step sis said u were getting ur hair cut, send me a pic when its done, i would send u a pic of my hair, but of course, TONY lost the digital and is blaming me, so im all pissed @ him (as usual...) o well... Call me when ya can 143 143 143 Ray *One by one penguins steal my sanity.*
sorry about having to go so fast lastnight, if i didnt get off the phone at that second, i would have been grounded from the internet and phone for a month... Call me 2day when ya can, k? luv ya Ray
I love you so much that words cant describe it, and even if i wrote 143 a million times it wouldnt be egnough. Love always Rachel ...I CAN SPELL MY NAME! lol

I cant wait 4 u 2 get back 2morrow! tell heather i say hi if u get this b4 u leave... tony is still driving me crazy... so much has gone on this summer already. i can't wait till i get to see you again. this summer cant get too much worse... i love you. call when u can!! iRay

You are the sweetest person ive ever known. I loved your last post so much! I love you so much! i cant believe its been 5 and a half months already. Our relashionship couldnt be better. Ya know. that ringtone is right. "Cuz im dreaming of you tonight. till tomorow, ill be holding you tight. And theres nowhere in the world id rather be. Then here in my room. Dreaming about you and me." I love that song. Its so true to. I dont need to see you everyday to be in love. Some of my friends say they could never keep a long-distance relationship going strong. But its not that hard when youve found someone as caring and as sweet as you. You're the perfect person for me, and i honestly dont know where i would be right now without you. I love you so much its undescribable. 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 yours always iRay

Thanks for coming back on Wednesday. It meant alot to me that we spent time 2gether. I love you so much that words cant describe it. even numbers cant... summer school is gonna suck ass, but theres not much i can do about it now, is there? These past 5 months have been great, and i cant thank you egnough for making my life worth living when its been hell. I love you so much. ill call u when i get home 2morrow, k? (i dunno when that will b tho cuz i get 2 walk home from ms 2 my house, fun rite? lol) 143 iRay
sry i couldnt call u when i got home, it wuz too late 2 call... juss got home now (1:45) lol... call me 2morrow (or should i say 2day lol) b4 1:00 cuz ashleys partys @ 2 143 iRay
ill b home round 11am... call me l8r? and check out my website its got some new stuff (like a pic w/ my haircut... lol) ttyl, k? 143 143 143 Love always iRay

hey! sry i wuznt home b4 when ya called! i juss got home from the dance now.. lol ^_^ It wuz fun till the end when ashleys head started hurting really badly... hope her tumors not getting worse... anyway... hows ur summer goin? lol... u should c me try 2 type rite now... im wearing these long nails, so im using a pencil 2 type... lol well neways... lol call me 2morrow, k? im babysitting @ around 6 2morrow night tho, so call b4 5, k? 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 Love always --iRay

Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! Omigod!!! I LOVE UR POST!!!!!!! ^_^ ^_^ ^_^ u r the sweetest person EVER!! I LOVE YOU sssssssssoooooooooooooooooo much ^_^ and frankly, i really dont care what people say about me and how I look as long as i like it... ive had more then 1 person come up to me and say something along the lines of "God, if I wuz as fat as you Id at least try to lose weight" and i get all in thier face and are like "WTF is ur problem?!? dont u think ive tried" lmfao... ive gotten in2 fights like that b4 with people i dont even know that come ^ 2 me in the streets. Rob isnt gonna screw up what i want my life 2 b like, and cecilia shouldnt for u either (lol... did i spell her name right?... lol) screw them and the world theyre gonna b like that! i really would probably be dead by now if it wasnt for u, my mom, jen, and ashley, so thanks. I would jump off a bridge for you. Id die for you. Id pretty much do anything for you ^_^ I LOVE U SSSSOOOOOO MUCH!!! SCREW THE WORLD!!!! LMFAO!!! Call me!!! 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 XOXOXOXOXOXOXOXOXOX LOVE always :* --iRay

OMG! 2day was the best day yet! i miss u so much, and the walk 2 ur house wuz so much fun. lol. I love you so much and couldnt live without you. i cant wait till after the concert so i can talk 2 u. i wont b home till round 10:20ish i love you so much. call me around 10:30. i love you Ray

hey sweetie! i just got home now (i wuz babysitting... fun rite? lol) so yea... i miss u so much! u better come visit soon. (remind me 2morrow 2 talk to vanessa, k? i keep on 4getting) how's ur hair? cant wait 2 see it. neway... call da cell if u get this 2nite, and if not, call me 2morrow... k? i love you sssooooo much! 143 always yours iRay

Awwwwwwww! you are so sweet! I couldnt live without you. On wednesday i felt like all the crap in my life just blew away for the hours that i was with you. i love you sooooooo much! you have no idea how much i wish you were here all the time instead of just sometimes. i miss you so much. come visit soon. I love you so much 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 iRay

it can rot in hell... i cant stand him anymore!!! i keep on telling myself... 'only 4 more years' but this is getting pathetic. i hate him! i hate him! i hate him! i hate him! I HATE HIM!!!! lol glad thats out of my system... lol call me when ya can 143&143 always iRay

hey there! woodfield was so fun 2day!!! isnt it funny that we didnt buy nething? lol!! i love u! i miss u so much already... and yunno wut? i cried on my way home... lol it was so wierd... i never cry anymore after we say goodbye... i miss you so much!!! call me when u get a chance! YYYYYYY i love u!! 143 143 143 143 143 143 143 love always iRay
hey brad, i dunno if u left 2nite, or if ur leaving 2morrow, but i just wanted u 2 kno that i love u so much... come visit b4 school starts!!! 143 143 143 iRay

i love you so much! this movie got me thinking about everything. Its about this couple, and starts with an old woman in a nursing home being read to by a man that also lives at the nursing home. The woman has some kind of memory loss disease, and the man is there because he had 2 heart attacks. The woman cant remember anything from her past life. and in reading the book to her, he is trying to bring her back. anyway... ill tell u more on the fone if u ask. I love u so much! and when you were asking me what i wanted for my birthday i honestly couldnt and still cant think of a better gift you could give me then to just visit me on my birthday. If its possible, i want to spend that day with you. call me 2morrow... i kno ur already asleep. I love you and miss you so much, and when i was thinking about my future and how i wanted to live my life, i couldnt see it without you in the picture. I love you so much, and you have made everything ive gone through so much eaiser. I love you so much. 143 --iRay p.s. this would be longer, but its kicking me off the cmp... (dont even waqnna think bout y...) love u

i cant wait till i see you again... for some reason, the last few days ive wanted to see you more then i have before... call me when you can. I love you so much. 143 143 143 xoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxo 143 143 143 iRay
